seo: node-red-contrib-huemagic,路径遍历,文件读取,漏洞检测
summary: 该插件用于检测node-red-contrib-huemagic插件是否存在路径遍历漏洞，通过构造特定请求尝试读取系统敏感文件来确认漏洞是否存在。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether the node-red-contrib-huemagic plugin has a directory traversal vulnerability by constructing specific requests to attempt reading system sensitive files to confirm the existence of the vulnerability.
